title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17ยง 2.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17ยง 2.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

It is the policy of the Department of Transportation to
comply fully with the spirit and provisions of the Personal Privacy Protection

Law; to maintain in its records only the personal information relevant and
necessary to accomplish a purpose or duty of the department or otherwise
required to be retained by law; to insure that records which pertain to an
individual are accurate, relevant, timely and complete; to insure that the
rights of the individual and of the public pursuant to law are preserved and
protected. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17ยง
2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
